mapper.select: SELECT s.uuid, s.store_name, s.store_type, s.company_name, s.company_address_province, s.company_address_city, s.company_address_county, s.company_address_detail, s.on_time_arr, s.check_sts, s.reject_detail, s.legal_person_front, s.legal_person_reverse, s.latitude, s.longitude, s.platform_fee, ( SELECT area_name FROM sys_area WHERE uuid = s.company_address_province ) AS addressProvinceName, ( SELECT area_name FROM sys_area WHERE uuid = s.company_address_city ) AS addressCityName, ( SELECT area_name FROM sys_area WHERE uuid = s.company_address_county ) AS addressCountyName FROM store s WHERE s.sts = 0 and s.uuid = #{uuid}

SELECT st.uuid, st.store_name, ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM goods WHERE parent_type = 1006 AND sts = 0 AND store_uuid = st.uuid ) AS share_count, ( SELECT image_url FROM store_images WHERE store_uuid = st.uuid AND sts = 0 AND image_type = 2 LIMIT 0, 1 ) AS image_url, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( vc.config_name ) FROM store_brand sb LEFT JOIN vehicle_config vc ON sb.brand_uuid = vc.uuid WHERE store_uuid = st.uuid ) brand_name, st.latitude, st.longitude FROM store st WHERE sts = 0 AND check_sts = 1 AND #{distance} > lat_lng_distance ( latitude, longitude, #{latitude}, #{longitude} ) and st.store_type = #{storeType} and EXISTS(select 1 from store_brand b where b.brand_uuid=#{brandUuid} and b.sts = 0 and b.store_uuid = st.uuid)
and st.uuid in (SELECT g.store_uuid from goods_detail gd ,goods g where g.uuid = gd.goods_uuid and gd.name = #{shareStationTypeName} )
